revised_title: Predicting Nuclear Spin Arrangement in HoVO4 below 1 K
tldr: The author uses nuclear magnetic resonance measurements to predict the nature of the nuclear spin arrangement in HoVO4 below 1 K. They demonstrate that a range of 'puckered' four sub-lattice arrangements have the same energy, and calculate the interactions between the ions to predict the ordered nuclear state and Neel temperature. The nuclear electric quadrupole interaction and exchange interaction are also discussed.
